room_title: Escape room "Blackout Gold Mine" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: What an awesome escape room! I have been to several different companies now but have to say this one was super worth it! As someone who has done a few different styles now I enjoy seeing new and creative takes on escape rooms as well as something with a bit of a challenge. Ariel did a great job welcoming us in and giving us the clues we needed when the time was right. Thanks for a great experience! We will definently be back!

room_title: Escape room "Blackout Gold Mine" by Colorado Escape in Denver
review: We had a great time! We finished the Black out and immediately asked if we could do another room. So Amber set up another room and we did the heist! It was great!!!!
